custom_capabilities.title: GetRecentSignInLogs
custom_capabilities.description: Retrieve the most recent sign-in logs for a specific user.
custom_capabilities.kql_query: SigninLogs | where UserPrincipalName == '{{userPrincipalName}}' | order by TimeGenerated desc | take 10

custom_capabilities.title: GetFailedSignInAttempts
custom_capabilities.description: Retrieve the failed sign-in attempts for a specific user within the last 24 hours.
custom_capabilities.kql_query: SigninLogs | where UserPrincipalName == '{{userPrincipalName}}' and ResultType != 0 and TimeGenerated > ago(24h) | order by TimeGenerated desc

custom_capabilities.title: GetSecurityAlerts
custom_capabilities.description: Retrieve the security alerts generated in the last 7 days.
custom_capabilities.kql_query: SecurityAlert | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) | order by TimeGenerated desc
